title: All-time record price for Kenilworth Estate BOP1
body_lines: Kenilworth Estate located in Ginigathhena, renowned for producing liquoring Orthodox teas has secured an all-time record price, of Rs.1,750 per kg for a BOP1 grade, in the Western Medium Grown Category at the tea auction held on 14th March 2022. This line of tea was purchased by Dilmah Ceylon Tea Company PLC. Kenilworth Estate is managed by Hatton Plantations PLC and John Keells PLC are the brokers for the produce of this Estate.
